channel.title: Grad School on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Grad School on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: What I Miss About Grad School
item.description: Earlier tonight, my friend texted me “I’m over this whole constantly chasing the homework train business.” She was talking about grad school, and sharing a sentiment I shared back when I was earning my master’s. But, a bit to my surprise, I replied, “I miss grad school.
